pages.text: When you are running out of time in The Vault, you are able to extend your time by eating $(l)Vault Fruit$(). Vault Fruit grants additional time, but with a penalty. Vault Fruits cannot be eaten when the Modifier $(l)Rotten$() is active.
A $(l)Sweet Kiwi$() grants 5 additional seconds to the Vault Timer with no penalty.
A $(l)Bitter Lemon$() grants 30 additional seconds to the Vault Timer at the cost of 3 hearts.
A $(l)Mystic Pear$() grants 5 additional minutes to the Vault Timer, at the cost of 5-10 hearts and wither effect or poison effect.
